title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Updated Dependabot documentation to clarify cooldown feature limitations (excludes NuGet) and improved branding consistency.
Upgraded `dotenv` dependency from v16.5.0 to v17.0.1 in `package.json` and `package-lock.json`.
Modified `dotenv.config()` calls to use `{ quiet: true }` across multiple files to suppress missing `.env` file warnings.

raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Updated Dependabot documentation to clarify cooldown feature limitations (excludes NuGet) and improved branding consistency.
- Upgraded `dotenv` dependency from v16.5.0 to v17.0.1 in `package.json` and `package-lock.json`.
- Modified `dotenv.config()` calls to use `{ quiet: true }` across multiple files to suppress missing `.env` file warnings.
